definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] lit. storm, arrogance, but only as names, v, infr,;—abs. ´[[ר]]: Is 30:7, [[רָָהַב]] Job 9:13 +;—
mythical sea monster (cf. Barton:JAOS xv. 1 (1891), 22 f.): ´[[עׂזְרֵי ר]]: Job 9:13; [[יָם]] Job 26:12 Ps 89:11; ‖[[תַּנִּיו ]] Is 51:9.
emblemat. name of Egypt, [[רַהַב וּבָבֶל]] Ps 87:4; ‖[[מחרים ]] Is 30:7.
